overview:
Arianne created a unique jewelry display designed for fashion forward women to display their bling called a jart board. :) Arianne created them because she tends to come up with solutions to things that she believes need to be simplified or streamlined…r

Ari currently lives in Winter Park, Fl. and is working on a few new ideas. Prior to this, she was the studio manager for a celebrity studio called Smashbox in LA(which she misses sometimes) and from 01-16 She was a modeling/Film/TV talent agent in Fl and LA at two agencies..and before that she was in highschool.

milestones.description: Owner : Central Fl Talent Inc SAG Agency. Representing Clients in Orlando, Miami, NY & LA. Sold to former employee Jackie Hazen after opening second agency in LA at 23 years old.

Owner, TAG Agency Los Angeles 2006-2009 Merged talent to One Management and became Studio Manager of Smashbox/Quixote . She moved back to Florida in 2010 where she is now a casting director doing Jart boards as a hobby that has landed recognition from buy
